Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 218th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/13/2015...
Injured on 7/23/2015 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,800,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/6/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Traded from Montreal to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: RF Jc Salomon, P Isaac Baker, P Saul Trejo, P Kenneth Cram, P Lee Wyrick. Going to CIN: P Geronimo Larosa)...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 6/15/2019 (Going to CIN: P Glenn Gwinn. Going to STL: P Geronimo Larosa)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/4/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $5,400,000 per year...
Injured on 9/14/2022 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/20/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
